post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Project Manager

  PROJECT MANAGER, WEB based application development

Total of 8-10 years with minimum 2 years as project manager in web based software development environment using J2EE architecture, Java, EJB, JSP, SQL, XML and HTML.
Good knowledge and practical experience with agile project management and development methodologies.

Responsibilities:
Work closely with customer and development team for business and design requirements.
Meeting customer expectations.
Develops project plans - time and cost estimates and manage project staff.
Provides formalized, continuing work direction and leadership to Developers including the scheduling, assignment, and review of project work.
Tracks, monitors and communicates project progress against the project plan, requirements, quality measures, standard processes and milestones.
Develop technical proposals and RFPs

Qualifications:
Relevant degree and/or equivalent work experience.
Expert level knowledge in MS project and Visio
Expertise in web based software application development
Excellent communication, presentation and inter personal skills.
Minimum of 8-10 years progressive software development experience including 2 years in project management role.

Send resumes: hr@bravespace.com no phone calls please

Additional Information
Salary: CAD 65,000.00 to CAD 75,000.00 per year
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
post.title: Project Manager
